name: Anamnesis (itch) (Aw3s0m3saus3)
description:
Anamnesis is about a girl who has completely lost her memories. Can you help her regain those of what she lost?

If you would like to support this project more, please take the survey at the end of the game! If the link doesn't work, here is a mirror.

Credits: Name:RoleItch:Jason KozinProgrammer
HereZachary SatagajProgrammer
HereHannah TrautzArtist/DesignerHereAlaina SminkeyArtist/DesignerHere Full Disclaimer!

This game is still in development, as this is an ongoing project between the four of us. Expect certain things in the current build to change!

We know there are some current "features" with the build, so here are some of the things we have noted:

  • The second level (Hub) textures break when entering it twice. This is an issue with parallax and we hope to fix this soon.
  • The third level (Above Boardwalk) is not finished yet, so assets have not been placed.
  • The forth level (Under Boardwalk) does not have textures for grapplable surfaces yet. 
  • Slopes can be a bit of an issue. There is no ETA on this currently.
  • The animation for swinging is implemented but not yet finished.
